title: Episode 11: Pretty for a dark-skinned girl
description: Season 2 is here! We explore the history of colorism, from Compton to the markets in Sudan. Dissecting a Hollywood casting call, and asking why are Black people bleaching their skin? It gets personal.
itunes:title: Pretty for a dark-skinned girl
itunes:subtitle: Struggling with colorism. Still.
author: hangout@thestoop.org (Hana Baba and Leila Day)
itunes:author: Hana Baba and Leila Day
itunes:summary: Season 2 is here! We explore the history of colorism, from Compton to the open markets in Sudan. Dissecting a Hollywood casting call, and asking why  are so many Black people  bleaching their skin? It gets personal.
content:encoded: Season 2 is here! We explore the history of colorism, from Compton to the markets in Sudan. Dissecting a Hollywood casting call, and asking why are Black people bleaching their skin? It gets personal.
